data.sentence: The word أَنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word ذَا comes from the root ذ و and is associated with the meanings:
The word وَبَنِينَ comes from the root ب ن و and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
data.sentence: The word مَالٍ comes from the root م و ل and is associated with the meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
